channel.title: Hey, quick question from a new user
channel.description:
On RS2, the screen tends to rotate a fraction every 15 or so seconds. I haven't checked if this happens on moparscape (Partly because I can't get on at the moment), but if it does, is there any way to stop this?
Note: The only software I currently have is Scar, would it be possible to make a script that'll counteract the rotation?

item.title: Hey, quick question from a new user
item.dc:creator: @Amerks5 Amerks5
item.description:
@Amerks5 wrote:

I don’t think it does because I use the downloadable mopar thats on my desktop, so that doesn’t move unless I make it move.

Read full topic
item.source: Hey, quick question from a new user
